data.name: Visite virtuelle de l'Assemblée nationale
data.detailed_description:
Visit the Assemblée nationale from home, with your computer or your virtual reality headset

A place with an exceptional heritage and history

Visit freely the emblematic places of the Assemblée nationale such as the hemicycle, the library or the large salons

An interactive visit

Learn more by taking the guided tour and interacting with the statues and paintings around you

Total immersion thanks to VR

Use your virtual reality headset to visit the Assemblée nationale as if you were there!

data.short_description: Visit the Assemblée nationale from home, with your computer or your virtual reality headset

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
